localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Where marketers go to find their people, be prolific, and hone their craft. Subscribe to get cutting edge, comprehensive, and sometimes crazy marketing ideas in your inbox every week. Join the community to connect with some of the smartest minds in marketing.
blogPost.body: Where marketers go to find their people, be prolific, and hone their craft. Subscribe to get cutting edge, comprehensive, and sometimes crazy marketing ideas in your inbox every week. Join the community to connect with some of the smartest minds in marketing.
blogPost.title: Swipe Files - Content, community, and courses to master marketing
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 营销人员去那里寻找他们的人，多产，磨练他们的手艺。每周订阅，在你的收件箱中获得前沿的、全面的、有时甚至疯狂的营销想法。加入社区，与一些最聪明的营销头脑建立联系。
localize.tagline: 掌握市场营销的内容、社区和课程

localize.description: 營銷人員去那裏尋找他們的人，多產，磨練他們的手藝。每週訂閱，在你的收件箱中獲得前沿的、全面的、有時甚至瘋狂的營銷想法。加入社區，與一些最聰明的營銷頭腦建立聯繫。
localize.tagline: 掌握市場營銷的內容、社區和課程

previous.excerpt: The next time you are with your co-founder or potential partner, get to know them better by taking turns answering questions from this deck of co-founder cards... Learn more about each other so you can work better both together and individually.
previous.title: Co-founder Question Cards - Questions to ask your co-founder to know each other better.

localize.description: 下次你和你的联合创始人或潜在的合作伙伴在一起的时候，可以通过轮流回答这副联合创始人牌中的问题来更好地了解他们...... 更多地了解对方，这样你们才能更好地合作和单独工作。
localize.tagline: 问你的联合创始人一些问题，以便更好地了解对方。

localize.description: 下次你和你的聯合創始人或潛在的合作伙伴在一起的時候，可以通過輪流回答這副聯合創始人牌中的問題來更好地瞭解他們...... 更多地瞭解對方，這樣你們才能更好地合作和單獨工作。
localize.tagline: 問你的聯合創始人一些問題，以便更好地瞭解對方。

next.title:
Warren Buffett has a net worth of $90 billion.

100% of that came after his seventh birthday.

localize.full_text:
巴菲特的净资产为900亿美元。

100%是在他七岁生日之后。

巴菲特的淨資產爲900億美元。

100%是在他七歲生日之後。
